name: onlyoffice-docspace
long_description: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace is a room-based collaborative platform which allows organizing a clear file structure depending on users' needs or project goals.

internal.title: Internal Mode
internal.description: Whether to run the DocSpace MCP server in internal mode.

transport.title: Transport Protocol
transport.description: The transport protocol to use for communication with the DocSpace MCP server. The HTTP transport is only available in internal mode for now.

user_agent.title: User Agent
user_agent.description: The user agent to include in the User-Agent header for DocSpace API requests.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Tools
dynamic.description: Whether to enable dynamic tools. Navigate to the documentation for more details about how dynamic tools work.

toolsets.title: Toolsets
toolsets.description: The comma-separated list of toolsets to use or 'all' to use all available toolsets. Navigate to the documentation for more details about how toolsets work.

enabled_tools.title: Enabled Tools
enabled_tools.description: The comma-separated list of tools to enable. Navigate to the documentation for more details about how enabled tools work.

disabled_tools.title: Disabled Tools
disabled_tools.description: The comma-separated list of tools to disable. Navigate to the documentation for more details about how disabled tools work.

base_url.title: Base URL
base_url.description: The base URL of the DocSpace instance for API requests.

origin.title: Origin URL
origin.description: The origin URL to include in the Origin header for DocSpace API requests.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: The API key for accessing the DocSpace API.

auth_token.title: Auth Token
auth_token.description: The Personal Access Token (PAT) for accessing the DocSpace API.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username for accessing the DocSpace API using basic authentication.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for accessing the DocSpace API using basic authentication.

host.title: Host
host.description: The host to listen on for incoming HTTP requests.

port.title: Port
port.description: The port to listen on for incoming HTTP requests.

session_ttl.title: Session TTL
session_ttl.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for HTTP sessions in milliseconds.

session_interval.title: Session Interval
session_interval.description: The interval for checking HTTP sessions for expiration in milliseconds.
